message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section at the bottom of the statement. Within this section, there is a line item called "Beginning Balance" which represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period.

From the table, I can see:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-05 |
| Beginning Balance  | 20000000.00 | 2024-02-05 |

Therefore, the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 20000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "20000000.00"}}
```
